name: nightmare
effect: Only works on sleeping Pokémon. Gives the target a nightmare, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP every turn. If the target wakes up or leaves the field, this effect ends.
short_effect: Target loses 1/4 its max HP every turn as long as it’s asleep.

flavor_text.sword_shield: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
